movie-description: This is a story about a pretty psychologist (Megumi Ozawa) who is raped, murdered, and dismembered while trying to avenge the suicide of a patient who was raped by a Yakuza gangster. Buried along with the remains of a rival gangster, Ozawa somehow melds with his corpse and comes back from the grave as a hermaphrodite zombie. A bloody and sadistic revenge is ahead.
movie-short-description: Directed by Kazuo 'Gaira' Komizu.  With Megumi Ozawa, Ayako Ishii, Seira Kitagawa, Ken Yoshizawa. A tortured and raped young girl mutates into a penis-headed demon and mutilates her captors.
